lead_paragraph: Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump said a lawsuit he is fighting over fraud claims involving Trump University is an attempted shakedown by a "sleazebag" law firm and a "horrible, horrible" lead plaintiff.

headline.main: Trump Acknowledged Trump University Flaws in Depositions
headline.print_headline: Trump Acknowledged Trump University Flaws in Depositions

snippet: Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump said a lawsuit he is fighting over fraud claims involving Trump University is an attempted shakedown by a "sleazebag" law firm and a "horrible, horrible" lead plaintiff....
